snippet.title: Steel Century Groove - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A rhythm-RPG where you pilot mecha in dance battles. Add to your wishlist here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1858950?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=video_description

Thousands of years ago, humanity built colossal war machines to stop the apocalypse. Now they just dance with them.

Assemble the perfect mecha crew, challenge every rival you lock eyes with, compete for the championship trophy, and uncover the secrets of a world where everything moves to the drumbeat of steel feet.
